price: O vjernici, ako Allaha pomognete, i On će vama pomoći i korake vaše učvrstiti.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن تَنصُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَنصُرۡكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتۡ أَقۡدَامَكُمۡ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū in tanṣurū al-laha yanṣur'kum wayuthabbit aqdāmakum
